creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
inscription: on right sheet, on back, in LRC, in pencil: RD 02 010 50 QTB
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Records of the Hostilities between Japan and Russia (Nichiro kōsen kibun 日露交戰紀聞)
title: On the 10th of March Amid Close Battle Between Our and Enemy Destroyers, a First Class Seaman of Our Sazanami Leapt Aboard an Enemy Ship, and Bearing Down on the Ship’s Captain, Gave a Thunderous Shout, and Brandishing his Sword, Cut Him Down and Kicked Him from the Deck into the Sea
